txt_en: People grow through experience if they meet life honestly and courageously.
txt_cn: 如果人诚实、勇敢地面对生活，就能从经历中获得成长。
author: 埃莉诺·罗斯福

txt_en: Do not linger to gather flowers to keep them, but walk on, for flowers will keep themselves blooming all your way.
txt_cn: 不要流连于采集花朵，只管向前走，一路上自会有百花盛开。
author: 泰戈尔

txt_en: All your lights are red, but I'm green to go.
txt_cn: 你哪怕示以红灯拒我前行，我也会心向绿灯一刻不停。
author: Troye Sivan, "BLUE"

txt_en: It's supposed to be hard. If it wasn't hard, everyone would do it.
txt_cn: 要做成一件事情本来就不容易，要是不难，岂不是谁都会去做？
author: 《红粉联盟》

txt_en: The best way out is always through.
txt_cn: 找到出口的最好方式就是一路走到底。
author: Robert Frost

txt_en: Change your thoughts and you change your world.
txt_cn: 改变你的想法，就是改变了你的世界。
author: Norman Vincent Peale

txt_en: Respect other people's feelings. It might mean nothing to you, but it could mean everything to them.
txt_cn: 尊重他人的感受。这对你可能无关紧要，但可能对他人十分重要。
author: Roy T. Bennett

txt_en: In the middle of every difficulty comes opportunity.
txt_cn: 每一个困境中都会出现机会。
author: Albert Einstein

txt_en: Where there is ruin, there is hope for a treasure.
txt_cn: 凡是有废墟的地方，就有可能藏着宝藏。
author: Jalaluddin Rumi

txt_en: The power of imagination makes us infinite.
txt_cn: 想象力让我们突破极限。
author: John Muir

txt_en: All achievements, all earned riches, have their beginning in an idea.
txt_cn: 所有的成就和财富都是从一个想法开始的。
author: Napolean Hill

txt_en: The more things you do, the more you can do.
txt_cn: 你做的事情越多，能做到的事情就越多。
author: Lucille Ball

txt_en: To know yourself is the first and most important step in pursuing your dreams and goals.
txt_cn: 了解自己是追求梦想和目标的第一步，也是最重要的一步。
author: Stedman Graham

txt_en: Do something today that your future self will thank you for.
txt_cn: 你今天做的事要让未来的你心存感激。
author: Sean Patrick Flanery

txt_en: It's not so much how busy you are, but why you are busy.
txt_cn: 重要的不是你有多忙，而是你为何而忙。
author: Mary Flannery O'Connor

txt_en: The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.
txt_cn: 成功的勇士也是普通人，但却具有激光般的专注力。
author: 李小龙
